Text:
Thanks to the poster for some new Custom Content. However, you may reconsider your packaging! Around here everything is suspect for bugs & viruses, especially .exe's

For those that may be concerned. This is a "FreeArc Self-extracting Archive" hence the executable extension. Passed Kaspersky (both before and after extraction) and extracted 84 .Sims3Pack files...Salty
well .rar wouldn't have had the same compression ratio :)

Nothing wrong excellent quality. Compression rocks. EXE is fine. Was a bit suss at 1st. If in doubt create a MS restore work every time.

Viper666 keep up the excellent work. Will be looking under you username for thing in future.
how and were do i install things like this? i would be happy if someone helped me.

Hi Viper, is there any way we can see the houses before downloading? Thanks much!!
btw no problem with your past exe.s
